location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:145 x 187 mmCondition:The print is in good condition with minor surface dirt throughout.Foliation:‘45’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject MatterView in the ruins of Babylon (near Al Hillah). High stone crumbling walls are visible in the middle and background, with a series of flag-stone steps visible lower left. In the background at right a round tower or chimney can be seen.InscriptionsInk, below image: 'Babylon'Pencil, above image at right: ‘45’;’23’
